thread.title: Bollywood celebs at Subhash Ghai's grand bash
thread.title_full: Bollywood celebs at Subhash Ghai's grand bash - Entertainment

author: The Centerstage Team
title: Bollywood celebs at Subhash Ghai's grand bash
text:
As subhash Ghai’s production house turned 37, the filmmaker hosted a big bash to celebrate the milestone.

Mukta and Subhash Ghai 

Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra 
Apart from production, it is also involved in distribution, and exhibition of television serials.

Abbas and Mustan Burmawalla 
The company has also forayed into education and exhibitons.

Govind Nihalani 
Filmmakers Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra and Abbas–Mustan were seen at the party.
